Summer may not officially be here yet, but that simply can’t stop us from making the most of the increasingly warmer, more beautiful weather. That means that barbecue season is approaching, and what better way to liven up your next backyard cookout than with the two returning favorite salsa flavors that have just arrived at Aldi? Enter Chimichurri Salsa and Chipotle Peach Salsa, which are priced at only $2.49 per container.

The salsas are back for a limited time. The Chipotle Peach Salsa offers a unique combination of flavors. It’s made from a mix of peaches, tomatoes, bell peppers, onions, cilantro, and smoky pepper flavor, for a blend of lightly spicy with just the right amount of sweet.

If you’re in the mood for a more savory taste, you’ll like that the Chimichurri Salsa is made from simple ingredients, including vine-ripened tomatoes, parsley, olive oil, just a hint of spicy tang, and the flavor perfectly complements a bag of tortilla chips. 

The Chipotle Peach Salsa offers a mix of flavors that stand out slightly more. It’s made from a mix of peaches, tomatoes, bell peppers, onions, cilantro, and smoky pepper flavor, for a blend of lightly spicy with just the right amount of sweet.

Aldi fans quickly took to social media to share their excitement about the returning salsas, including one fan who’s been patiently waiting for Aldi to bring it back. One shopper commented on Instagram, “That chimichurri salsa is so good! I got it last year as a new Aldi shopper and was so sad it was seasonal!”

Stocking up on both flavors for your next barbecue or for your own snacking pleasure is a no-brainer. Not only do they pair perfectly with any of Aldi’s tortilla chips, you can even enjoy them with plain potato chips, on homemade tacos, taco salads, and burrito bowls.
If you’re thinking about giving these salsa varieties a try, don’t wait long. As Aldi shoppers know, seasonal products don’t stick around once they sell out, so you’ll want to stock up ASAP, especially if you plan on hosting backyard cookouts this season.
